projects.title: Azon Shop
projects.text: E-Commerce website with typescript, optimistic updates, authentication, persistent cart, categories, infinite scroll and order tracking.

projects.title: PetsPaw
projects.text: Social media app for cat lovers.  Voting, gallery, dark theme, info pages about each cat breed with pictures, ploading your cats, user actions history and search. Built with custom hooks and reusable components.

projects.title: Banquee
projects.text: Multi-page landing for a bank with complex animations, CTA, blog, FAQ page, parallax effect. See more on github.

projects.title: The Chat App
projects.text: Full-stack, real time messaging app with authentication, cookies, jwt, chats history persistence, avatar selection
